content: I think, as you know, I do believe, like I said, we’re at least going to do what we have been doing as a whole, not quarter four, but as a whole, you look at the back half of the year for Class 8 deliveries. Used margins came down from Q4, as I said, and I don’t look for them to drop dramatically right now, but they should start trending down as used as new truck retail deliveries go into the marketplace that will offset some of the used that we have seen over the last 12 months, the used demand.
